commit message: Fixed the momospace font issue of the key editor for Android 5.0+.
Samsung's Galaxy Ace 4 is not supported.

Fixed the dash error on Galaxy S5 devices.

This is just a workaround. The real issue is a bug in the
Android ROM of S5 devices.

New release: 2.0.1

Updated target SDK version.
Updated changelog.
Increased version number.
